properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/lambda/prod-error-logger' | fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like /ERROR/ or @message like /CRITICAL/
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 50
properties.title: Recent Errors from All Lambdas

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/lambda/prod-error-logger' | fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like /CRITICAL/
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 20
properties.title: Critical Errors

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/lambda/prod-error-logger' | fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like /ERROR/
| stats count() by bin(5m)
properties.title: Error Rate Over Time

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/lambda/prod-error-logger' | fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like /ERROR/
| fields @message
| parse @message /Source: (?<source_lambda>\S+)/
| stats count() by source_lambda
| sort count desc
properties.title: Errors by Lambda Function
